text: James Alton McDivitt (June 10, 1929 - October 13, 2022) was an American test pilot, United States Air Force (USAF) pilot, aeronautical engineer, and NASA astronaut. He flew in the Gemini and Apollo programs. McDivitt died on October 13, 2022 in Tucson, Arizona at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American aviators Category:Engineers from Chicago Category:American astronauts Category:Scientists from Chicago
title: James McDivitt
